CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( ACG_Sentiment__c , "Positive") ,(IMAGE("/resource/Sentiment_Positive","Positive",30,-1) & " Positive"), IF( ISPICKVAL( ACG_Sentiment__c , "Neutral") ,(IMAGE("/resource/Sentiment_Neutral","Neutral",30,-1) & " Neutral"), IF( ISPICKVAL( ACG_Sentiment__c , "Negative") ,(IMAGE("/resource/Sentiment_Negative","Negative",30,-1) & " Negative"), IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(ACG_Sentiment__c )),"","") ) ) )
CustomField.label: Sentiment
